sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"相反的，对立的"之意。
means: opposite ： 指位置、方向、行动或想法等完全相反。
contrary ： 一般指与某种主张、看法或行为等正好相反，隐含否定一方并不意味着肯定另一方的意味。
adverse ： 通常指违害利益的、无生命的势力或条件等，侧重分歧。
reverse ： 指朝相反方向的或反面(背面)的。
converse ： 指在方向、行动或意见上相反的。

sentence.Network_en: Several of those present, including Weinberger, had contrary information.
sentence.Network_cn: 几个在场的人，包括温博格，所掌握的信息截然不同。

sentence.Network_en: Dena looked appealingly at Blair, hoping to hear a contrary opinion.
sentence.Network_cn: 德娜恳切地看着布莱尔，希望听到相反的观点。

sentence.Network_en: Contrary to popular belief, moderate exercise actually decreases your appetite.
sentence.Network_cn: 与通常的看法相反，适度的运动事实上会降低食欲。

最新英语新课标必修3英语单词表_百度知道 ... continent n. 洲；大陆 contrary n. 反面；对立面 on the contrary 与此相反；正相反.
高二英语词汇表 ... fighter n. 战士;奋斗者;战斗机 contrary adj. 相反的;相对的;对抗的 on the contrary 正相反.

list.abs: contrapositive sentence 换质位contrary propositions 相反命题contravariant 反变式
石油词汇英语翻译(CD) ... contrarotation 反向旋转 contrary sign 异号 contrary-turning propeller 对转推进器.
专四高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... content with 满足于 contrary to 违反 counter to 与……相反.
英语—医学 ... consist with[ 与……一致] · contrary to[ 与……相反] · cope with[ 对付] &#183.
contraction of the concrete 混凝土收缩contrary wind 逆风control 第

jx.jx_en_mean: conflicting with or running counter to
jx.jx_cn_mean: 与…相反，与…背道而驰；违反

lj.lj_ly: contrary to his expectations, he found the atmosphere exciting.
lj.lj_ls: 出乎他的意料，他发现气氛令人激动。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to intensify a denial of what has just been implied or stated by suggesting that the opposite is the case

lj.lj_ly: there was no malice in her; on the contrary, she was very kind.
lj.lj_ls: 她并无恶意；恰恰相反，她人很好。

jx.jx_en_mean: with the opposite meaning or implication

lj.lj_ly: he continued to drink despite medical advice to the contrary.
lj.lj_ls: 尽管医生的建议与此相反，他仍然继续喝酒。

jx.jx_en_mean: In opposition to what is expected.
In opposition to what has been stated or what is expected
jx.jx_cn_mean: 相反的：与已说的话相反或与预期的相反的

lj.lj_ly: I'm not sick; on the contrary, I'm in the peak of health.
lj.lj_ls: 我没有病；恰恰相反，我健康极了

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French contrarie, from Latin contrarius, from contra 'against'

entry.def: Ideas, attitudes, or reactions that are contrary to each other are completely different from each other.

example.ex: This view is contrary to the aims of critical social research for a number of reasons...
example.tran: 之所以说此观点违背了批判性社会研究的宗旨，有几点理由。

example.ex: Several of those present, including Weinberger, had contrary information.
example.tran: 几个在场的人，包括温博格，所掌握的信息截然不同。

entry.def: If you say that something is true contrary to other people's beliefs or opinions, you are emphasizing that it is true and that they are wrong.

example.ex: Contrary to popular belief, moderate exercise actually decreases your appetite...
example.tran: 与通常的看法相反，适度的运动事实上会降低食欲。

example.ex: Contrary to what you might think, neither man was offended.
example.tran: 你也许以为那两个人生气了，但实际上正相反，两个人都没有生气。

entry.def: You use on the contrary when you have just said or implied that something is not true and are going to say  that the opposite is true.

example.ex: It is not an idea around which the Community can unite. On the contrary, I see it as one that will divide us.
example.tran: 这种想法并不能让欧共体团结一致。相反地，我认为它会导致我们的分裂。

entry.def: You can use on the contrary when you are disagreeing strongly with something that has just been said or implied, or are making a strong negative reply.

example.ex: 'People just don't do things like that.' — 'On the contrary, they do them all the time.'
example.tran: “人们根本不会做那样的事情。”——“恰恰相反，他们一直在那样做。”

entry.tran: 完全相反;完全不同;根本不是
entry.def: You can use quite the contrary to emphasize a previous negative statement, or when you are making a strong negative reply.

example.ex: I'm not a feminist, quite the contrary...
example.tran: 我不是一个女权主义者，根本不是。

example.ex: 'Are there any signs that he may quit soon?' — 'Quite the contrary.'
example.tran: “有没有迹象表明他可能很快就会辞职？”——“完全没有。”

entry.def: When a particular idea is being considered, evidence or statements to the contrary suggest that this idea is not true or that the opposite is true.

example.ex: That does not automatically mean, however, that the money supply has been curbed, and there is considerable evidence to the contrary...
example.tran: 然而，那并不一定意味着货币供应量受到了限制，有大量证据表明事实正好相反。

example.ex: Despite repeated assurances to the contrary, Pakistan has not ended its nuclear programme.
example.tran: 尽管巴基斯坦再三保证停止其核项目，但事实却并非如此。

sentences.sentence: "we thought Sue was older than Bill but just the reverse was true"
"public opinion to the contrary he is not guilty"

means.word_mean: 3. two propositions are contraries if both cannot be true but both can be false
1. very opposed in nature or character or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "acts contrary to our code of ethics"
"the facts point to a contrary conclusion"

means.word_mean: 2. of words or propositions so related that both cannot be true but both may be false;

sentences.sentence: "an obstinate child with a violent temper"

auth_sentence.content: Deniers take a contrary stand regardless of the evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Deniers take a contrary stand regardless of the evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Deniers take a contrary stand regardless of the evidence.

auth_sentence.content: On the contrary, it is a huge hinderance.
auth_sentence.res_content: On the contrary, it is a huge hinderance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On the contrary, it is a huge hinderance.

auth_sentence.content: That theory collapsed in the face of contrary evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: That theory collapsed in the face of contrary evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That theory collapsed in the face of contrary evidence.

Sentence.sentence: Contrary to many people's prediction of its death, the film industry survived.
Contrary to the old warning that time waits for no one, time slows down when you are on the move.
He behaves in a way contrary to his real intention.
Its findings are quite contrary to previous research

sentences.en: My sister's taste in dresses is contrary to my own.
sentences.cn: 在服装方面, 我妹妹的爱好和我完全不同。

means.word_mean: 相反, 反面, 对立面

sentences.en: They did not say the contrary.
sentences.cn: 他们没有说意思相反的话。

sentences.en: He is neither tall nor the contrary.

jushi.chinese: 黑和白是两个相对的概念。

jushi.english: Oranges won't grow in contrary climate.
jushi.chinese: 柑橘在不利的气候条件下不能生长。
